import os
# Set minimal environment for testing
os.environ[''COHERE_API_KEY''] = ''test-key''
os.environ[''QDRANT_URL''] = ''http://localhost:6333''
from main import DocusaurusEmbeddingPipeline
print(''Module imported successfully'')
# Test the text chunking functionality
pipeline = DocusaurusEmbeddingPipeline.__new__(DocusaurusEmbeddingPipeline)  # Create instance without calling __init__
text = ''This is a test sentence. Here is another sentence! And a third one? Yes, indeed.''
chunks = pipeline.chunk_text(text, chunk_size=30, overlap=5)
print(f''Chunked {len(text)} chars into {len(chunks)} chunks'')
for i, chunk in enumerate(chunks):
    print(f''Chunk {i}: {len(chunk[""content""])} chars - {chunk[""content""][:50]}...'')
")
